verses.roman:
vasi' nāma laya purī, nidrā nāhi haya
śeṣa-rātre tandrā haila,--bāhya-vṛtti-laya

synonyms: vasi'-sitting there; nāma laya—chants the Hare Kṛṣṇa mahā-mantra; purī—Mādhavendra Purī; nidrā—sleep; nāhi haya—there was not; śeṣa-rātre—at the end of the night; tandrā—dozing; haila—there was; bāhya-vṛtti—of external activities; laya—stop.
translation: Mādhavendra Purī could not sleep. He sat and chanted the Hare Kṛṣṇa mahā-mantra, and at the end of the night he dozed a little, and his external activities stopped.
